definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Results of escaping dark experiment of aluminium trichloride-induced model of senescence.
sentences.chinese: 三氯化鋁所致急性衰老模型避暗法實驗結果。

sentences.english: Polymeric aluminum chloride (PAC) is an inorganic macromolecular compound which is good at cleaning water.
sentences.chinese: 聚合氯化鋁又稱PAC，是一種無機高分子化合物。

sentences.english: The high-effective water treatment agent-polyaluminium chloride is produced by industrial aluminiferous waste slag.
sentences.chinese: 利用工業含鋁廢渣生產高效水處理劑聚合氯化鋁。

sentences.english: The aluminum calcium chloride is noncorrosive to equipment.
sentences.chinese: 同時，氯化鋁鈣爲中性藥劑，對設備無腐蝕性。

sentences.english: Objective To simplify the detection method of sulfate in the water purifying agent poly aluminium chloride.
sentences.chinese: 目的簡化淨水劑聚氯化鋁中硫酸根的分析方法。
